text: “O Zerusaremiŋ, Zerusaremiŋ, nde kha Fhe Bakɨmen kamthooŋ gumgi, ndu mbe shogim, mbe vhɨzim, ndu kha Fhe Bakɨme sasarigi ndun han zi gumgi, ndu ŋkɨɨr mbe sav, mbe shogim, mbe vhɨzi ne ma. Gu tugi vhɨrvera, gu ndun tari, gu mbe fugɨp, tuara meeŋ won ŋgugi fugap won vhɨganin mbe vharigi tɨvar ndun tarir muun za mbuim, mbe thagi.
